about_the_game:
Darkness Blooms is a classic fantasy team RPG with a big world and an epic story to discover. This top down pixel art game has an truly grand and complex story for you to discover as you make friends, defeat enemies, and try to save the world. You will be confronted with ethical, moral, political choices and these choices will effect the world around you. You will gain experience, unlock new abilities, unlock new playable characters and story lines and each play through will be unique based on the choices you make and the friends you keep in your party.

---

In this long peace the world no longer needs heroes but in every great story you have ever heard there was one warrior strong enough to answer the call. How can anyone prove they are strong enough to be a hero in a world so boring. You only wish there were bad guys in the world so you could prove your self but I promise you will live to regret that wish..

The long peace has been broken, not by man but by nature its self. Something has awoken a anger within the world and the plant and animal life have been possessed by rage. The world had gotten used to peace and are not prepared to to defend them selves from this attack, an attack from everywhere. Some try to defend their homes. Some travel north to reach to gates of the kingdom. Many die. What will you do? Are you ready to be a hero?

In this world your greatest dream and your worse nightmare come true at once as you are forced to become the hero you always dreamt of. However life as a hero is much darker and harder than you ever expected. It comes with great pain and great loss. And you will learn no hero can do it alone.

Darkness Blooms mixes action adventure in the style of Link To The Past with turn based team combat in the style of Final Fantasy. As you gain strength you will be able to defeat small foes with a single swing avoiding any need to fall into combat. Bosses however will take the whole team in formation and with a strategy in mind. Each unlockable character comes with their own skills and abilities both inside and outside of combat. A strong defender, a fast thief, an empathetic healer, a curious explorer, and more. The story will take you from your small boring town to explore the whole world and see and experience things you could not have believed possible. And maybe you will make some friends along the way.
